title: Power Analysis: Sofia Gomez Villafañe digs deep to win the Leadville Trail 100 MTB race
content:
After seeing Ruth Winder in her rearview with three miles to go, the Leadville champ 'turned herself inside out' to get to the finish line.

Read the full article at Power Analysis: Sofia Gomez Villafañe digs deep to win the Leadville Trail 100 MTB race on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
